title: Remove the “Software update” update-available pop-up from the app

requirements.text: Remove the in-app "Software update"/"Update Available" pop-up/banner so it is never shown anywhere in the app, while keeping all other UI and functionality unchanged. This includes removing the PendingUpdateBanner rendering from all App entry states (unauthenticated view, actor initialization error view, profile setup view, and main authenticated view).

quotes: keep all other the same but remove "Software update" pop up window from app

acceptanceCriteria: No update-related pop-up/banner is displayed on any screen/state of the app (unauthenticated, authenticated, profile setup, or connection error states).
All other app behavior remains unchanged (login, quiz flows, diagnostics, etc.).
The frontend builds successfully with no unused-import or lint/type errors related to PendingUpdateBanner.

constraints: Do not modify any other UI, copy, flows, or backend behavior beyond removing the software-update pop-up/banner.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
nonGoals: Adding a different update notification mechanism.
Changing service worker/cache refresh behavior beyond removing the UI pop-up/banner.
